name: [ZX Spectrum] Sinty Snoki
description:
First every game for ZX Spectrum 128K with midi music sound track! 

This is snake game for ZX Spectrum 128 with MIDI Synth connected to RS232/Midi connector. 

It also should work on ZXUno(and clones) with Midi addon, on spectrums with external MIDI sound card compatible with midi out of original 128k speccy.

It supports keyboard and kempston controls.

IMPORTANT NOTES: You must run this game with any turbo modes disabled. Your speccy should work on classic 3.5 MHz mode.

Techical instructions for making midi out cable: https://benophetinternet.nl/hobby/vanmezelf/ZX_Spectrum_Midi_Out.pdf
